jobs_description.title: Backend Developer - Script with Pandas and Python
jobs_description.description: Development of a script in Python, using the 'Pandas' library, to extract data from an Excel file and send automated messages to WhatsApp. Windows configuration to automate the execution of the script at a specific time.

projects.title: IUPI
projects.description: 3rd place in the Hackathon through the No Country platform. Iupi is a Savings and Investment Management APP, providing accessible options to achieve financial goals.

projects.title: EUREKA
projects.description: Eureka is an online E-learning platform that offers a wide variety of courses on various topics. Teachers can create courses and add content to them. Students can enroll and study the selected course.

projects.title: Binance Scanner Bot
projects.description: Bot that constantly scans a price range 'X' at an interval 'Y' and sends alerts to a Telegram channel via a Telegram bot automatically. It also informs the console about the information sent.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: I am a Full Stack Developer
about.description:
More than 3 years ago, I resumed my studies in programming, first studying Python autodidactically.

After 6 months, the 'Argentina Programa 4.0' plan was presented to me, which offered a Full Stack course (the only Front-end part was in a Desktop app with Swing) with JAVA.

While continuing my (SELF-TAUGHT) studies, I started to register on a platform called 'No Country', which allows connecting programmers and working in teams to create larger apps.

On this same platform, I was able to participate in 2 hackathons to gain more experience, as now a 'REAL CLIENT' was involved.

Up to the present, I am adding React and Next.js to my knowledge. I am capable of doing: Automation systems, RESTful APIs, WEB Apps, Desktop Apps and more...

contact.title: Ready to bring your ideas to life?
